name: FAST Racing NEO
summary:
Fast Racing Neo is a futuristic racing video game developed by Shin'en Multimedia and released for the Wii U in December 2015. It is often compared to Nintendo's F-Zero franchise.

It is the second entry in the series, the first being Fast Racing League released on WiiWare for the Wii in 2011.
info:
• 中文名: 极速赛车NEO
  • 平台: Nintendo Switch
  • 平台: Wii U
  • 游戏类型: RAC
  • 游玩人数: 1-8人
  • 发行日期: 2015年12月10日
  • 售价: $14.99
  • 官方网站: http://fast.shinen.com/neo/
